scripts.build:ios-css: node-sass --include-path node_modules/ionic-angular --include-path node_modules/ionicons/dist/scss client/theme/app.ios.scss | postcss --local-plugins --use autoprefixer --output public/stylesheets/ios-bundle.css
scripts.build:md-css: node-sass --include-path node_modules/ionic-angular --include-path node_modules/ionicons/dist/scss client/theme/app.md.scss | postcss --local-plugins --use autoprefixer --output public/stylesheets/md-bundle.css
scripts.watch:css: nodemon -w client -e scss -x npm run build:ios-css build:md-css
